isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - SEATS

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Daycab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 66
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four hex nuts with capture washers (Item 1) from seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) of passenger air bucket seat (Item 3). Disconnect air line (Item 4) from passenger air bucket seat at the quick disconnect connector (Item 5). Lay air line out of the way. It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.

Remove torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 6) and remove outer seat belt (Item 7) and outboard tether belt (Item 8) from seat belt mounting bracket (Item 9). Lay torx head seat belt anchor bolt, seat belt and outboard tether belt out of the way and save for installation.

Remove torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 10) and remove inner seat belt buckle (Item 11) and inboard tether belt (Item 12) from seat belt mounting bracket (Item 13). Lay torx head seat belt anchor bolt and seat belt out of the way and save for installation.

Lift passenger air bucket seat (Item 3) off seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) and remove passenger air bucket seat from inside cab. Lay passenger air bucket seat out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 66. Passenger Air Bucket Seat in Daycab

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX NUT WITH CAPTURE WASHER (M8 X 1.25)
6. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 60)
10. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 60)
16. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)
18. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Fixed Passenger Seat on Daycab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 67 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four hex nuts with capture washers (Item 1) from seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) of fixed passenger seat (Item 3). It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.
Lift fixed passenger seat (Item 3) off seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) and remove fixed passenger seat from inside cab. Lay fixed passenger seat out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 67. Fixed Passenger Seat in Daycab

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX NUT WITH CAPTURE WASHER (M8 X 1.25)
2. SEAT MOUNTING BOLT STUD FOR FIXED PASSENGER SEAT
6. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)
8. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)
10. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 53)
12. SEAT MOUNTING BOLT STUD FOR DRIVER AIR BUCKET

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Air Bucket Seat on Daycab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 68
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four hex nuts with capture washers (Item 1) from seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) of driver air bucket seat (Item 3). Disconnect air line (Item 4) from driver bucket seat at the quick disconnect connector (Item 5). Lay air line out of the way. It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.

Remove torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 6) and remove outer seat belt (Item 7) and outboard tether belt (Item 8) from seat belt mounting bracket (Item 9). Lay torx head seat belt anchor bolt, seat belt and outboard tether belt out of the way and save for installation.

Remove torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 10) and remove inner seat belt buckle (Item 11) and inboard tether belt (Item 12) from seat belt mounting bracket (Item 13). Lay torx head seat belt anchor bolt and seat belt out of the way and save for installation.
Lift driver air bucket seat (Item 3) off seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) and remove driver air bucket seat from inside cab. Lay driver air bucket seat out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 68. Driver Air Bucket Seat in Daycab

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX NUT WITH CAPTURE WASHER (M8 X 1.25)
6. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 60)
10. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 60)
16. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)
18. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 69
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four hex nuts with capture washers (Item 1) from two seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) and seat mounting hex bolt with washer (Item 3) of passenger air bucket seat (Item 4). Disconnect air line (Item 5) from passenger air bucket seat at the quick disconnect connector (Item 6). Lay air line out of the way. It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.

Remove torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 7) and remove outer seat belt (Item 8) and outboard tether belt (Item 9) from seat belt mounting bracket (Item 10). Lay torx head seat belt anchor bolt, seat belt and outboard tether belt out of the way and save for installation.

Remove torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 11) and remove inner seat belt buckle (Item 12) and inboard tether belt (Item 13) from seat belt mounting bracket (Item 14). Lay torx head seat belt anchor bolt and seat belt out of the way and save for installation.

Lift passenger air bucket seat (Item 4) off seat mounting bolt studs (Items 2 and 3) and remove passenger air bucket seat from inside cab. Lay passenger air bucket seat out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 69. Passenger Air Bucket Seat in Sleeper Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX NUT WITH CAPTURE WASHER (M8 X 1.25)
3. SEAT MOUNTING HEX BOLT WITH WASHER, PATCH, DOG POINT (M8 X 81)
7. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 60)
11. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 60)
17. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)
19. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Fixed Passenger Seat on Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 70 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four hex nuts with capture washers (Item 1) from two seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) at the front of the seat and two seat mounting hex bolt with washer (Item 3) at the rear of fixed passenger seat (Item 4). It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.
Lift fixed passenger seat (Item 4) off seat mounting bolt studs (Items 2 and 3) and remove fixed passenger seat from inside cab. Lay fixed passenger seat out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 70. Fixed Passenger Seat in Sleeper Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX NUT WITH CAPTURE WASHER (M8 X 1.25)
3. SEAT MOUNTING HEX BOLT WITH WASHER, PATCH, DOG POINT (M8 X 81)
7. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)
9. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 41)
11. TORX HEAD SEAT BELT ANCHOR BOLT (M12 X 53)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Air Bucket Seat on Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 71
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four hex nuts with capture washers (Item 1) from two seat mounting bolt studs (Item 2) and seat mounting hex bolt with washer (Item 3) of driver air bucket seat (Item 4). Disconnect air line (Item 5) from driver air bucket seat at the quick disconnect connector (Item 6). Lay air line out of the way. It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.

Remove torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 7) and remove outer seat belt (Item 8) and outboard tether belt (Item 9) from seat belt mounting bracket (Item 10). Lay torx head seat belt anchor bolt, seat belt and outboard tether belt out of the way and save for installation.

Remove torx head seat belt anchor bolt (Item 11) and remove inner seat belt buckle (Item 12) and inboard tether belt (Item 13) from seat belt mounting bracket (Item 14). Lay torx head seat belt anchor bolt and seat belt out of the way and save for installation.

Lift driver air bucket seat (Item 4) off seat mounting bolt studs (Items 2 and 3) and remove driver air bucket seat from inside cab. Lay driver air bucket seat out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 71. Driver Air Bucket Seat in Sleeper Cab
